implementation_summary.title: [Feature] 添加 Todo 不可变性/拷贝支持（__eq__, __hash__, copy 方法）
implementation_summary.description: Added __eq__, __hash__, and copy methods to the Todo dataclass to enable proper object comparison, hashability for use in sets/dicts, and creating derived copies.

acceptance_criteria.hash_method: hash(Todo(1, 'a')) does not throw exception and is consistent
acceptance_criteria.copy_method: todo.copy(text='new') returns new instance with updated text

risks: Equality intentionally ignores timestamps (created_at, updated_at) to allow semantic equality
Hash uses (id, text, done) tuple to match __eq__ behavior
